ProjectTitle: Experiential futuring as co-creative methodology to help youth respond to social media outage in (un)livable climates
InitialFeedbackHistory: 13/03/2023 [REDACTED] did you include ethics review in your PRET application? [REDACTED] is recommended to include this for all research with human participants including interviews, for more information: https://research.kuleuven.be/en/integrity-ethics/ethics [REDACTED] if you only collect a few GB of data preserving on the J dive is ok, if you, together with others in your group have larger volumes to preserve it is more cost efficient to use the archive server, for more information see: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en [REDACTED] when you deposit your data in RDR a PID (DOI) will be added
label: good with suggestions
